citeinfo.origin: Japan Agency for Marine-Earth Science and Technology (JAMSTEC)
citeinfo.title: JAMSTEC Submarine Cable Data Center

abstract.p: The Submarine Cable Data Center provides realtime data from the deep sea floor observatory off Kushiro-takachi, off Muroto Cape, and off Hatsushima. Data are available for download with user registration.

purpose.p: The Japan Agency for Marine-Earth Science and Technology (JAMSTEC) established the first Long-Term Deep Sea Floor Observatory off Muroto Cape in fiscal year 1996, and the Long-Term Deep Sea Floor Observatory off Kushiro and Tokachi in the Kuril Trench in 1999 as part of a plan to build basic earthquake observation networks in Japan. JAMSTEC now is planning the construction of additional systems. This site is presented with the objective of widely providing observation data of the foregoing systems.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
